Tokens.innerText:
You wake up, floating in the dark. Where are you? When are you? Is this death? You move your arm, and you feel water splash. Oh, sweet. Nah, it’s all good, you’re just floating in a sensory deprivation tank! The hatch is above you. You could probably OPEN it.
[[OPEN -> Garage]]

tokens.text: You wake up, floating in the dark. Where are you? When are you? Is this death? You move your arm, and you feel water splash. Oh, sweet. Nah, it’s all good, you’re just floating in a sensory deprivation tank! The hatch is above you. You could probably OPEN it.

Tokens.text: You search the desk, opening all the drawers. There’s a NOTE with a long string of numbers written on it. There’s a tape player, which you could USE to play the TAPE. Other than that, there’s just a bunch of assorted office supplies. Oh, and there’s a GUN.
Double-click this passage to edit it.

Tokens.innerText: You need a tape player to play the tape. [USE TAPE]<ut|
Tokens.text: [You need a tape player to play the tape. [USE TAPE]<ut|]

tokens.text: You need a tape player to play the tape.

Tokens.innerText:
You pull the tape player out of the desk drawer and put the audio TAPE inside it. You hit play. A gravelly voice starts talking.

Hello agent, this is your commander. We have sent you to Moscow to infiltrate a research facility that, we believe, is developing a machine that can alter people’s minds. You have been outfitted with the cyborg implant Total Environmental Transcription/Reactive Information Synthesis, or T.E.T./R.I.S., to aid in your mission. It will allow you to quickly analyze your surroundings and determine your best courses of action. Good luck.

The tape ends. [USE TAPE]<ut|
Tokens.text:
[You pull the tape player out of the desk drawer and put the audio TAPE inside it. You hit play. A gravelly voice starts talking.

Hello agent, this is your commander. We have sent you to Moscow to infiltrate a research facility that, we believe, is developing a machine that can alter people’s minds. You have been outfitted with the cyborg implant Total Environmental Transcription/Reactive Information Synthesis, or T.E.T./R.I.S., to aid in your mission. It will allow you to quickly analyze your surroundings and determine your best courses of action. Good luck.

The tape ends. [USE TAPE]<ut|]

tokens.text: You pull the tape player out of the desk drawer and put the audio TAPE inside it. You hit play. A gravelly voice starts talking.

Hello agent, this is your commander. We have sent you to Moscow to infiltrate a research facility that, we believe, is developing a machine that can alter people’s minds. You have been outfitted with the cyborg implant Total Environmental Transcription/Reactive Information Synthesis, or T.E.T./R.I.S., to aid in your mission. It will allow you to quickly analyze your surroundings and determine your best courses of action. Good luck.

Tokens.innerText: The door won’t open. Looks like you need a password for this keypad.[NORTH]<no|[OPEN]<no|
Tokens.text: [The door won’t open. Looks like you need a password for this keypad.[NORTH]<no|[OPEN]<no|]

tokens.text: The door won’t open. Looks like you need a password for this keypad.

Tokens.text: You try to HACK the keypad next to the door. You don’t get the door open, but you do learn that the password is long, and would be difficult to remember for underpaid guards.
You pound on the hatch until it springs open. You haul yourself out of the tank

You’re in a garage. There is a door to the NORTH, with a keypad next to it. There is a CAMERA in the northwest corner, and another in the northeast. There is a desk with several drawers. You feel something in your pocket. When you check to see what it is, you find an audio TAPE.

(set: $location to (dm: "GARAGE", true, "WAREHOUSE", false))
